original: Forsman, Sven Gustaf Ivar, läroverksadjunkt, Ulricehamn, f. 7/9/09 i Lund av överkonst. J. A. F. o. Ester Johansson. G. 43 m. Greta Larsson. Barn: Marianne f. 45. — Stud:ex. i Lund 28, fil. mag. 33, provår v. Gbgs folksk:sem. 39-40. Res. t. Norge o. Danm. uppr. ggr, Österr. 37, Tyskl. 37 o. 38. Timlär. v. Osby samsk. 33-34, e. o. ämneslär. där 34-38, e. adj. i Simrishamn 38-39, Amål 40, e. o. adj. där 40, Ulricehamn 40-44, adj. i ma-tem., fysik o. kemi v. Ulricehamns samrealsk. sed. 44.
translated: Forsman, Sven Gustaf Ivar, high school teacher, Ulricehamn, born on September 7th, 1909 in Lund to Konstapel J. A. F. and Ester Johansson. Married in 1943 to Greta Larsson with one child, Marianne, born in 1945. He graduated from Lund University with a teaching degree in 1928 and a Master of Arts degree in 1933. He completed a provisional year at the Gothenburg Primary School Seminary from 1939 to 1940 and traveled to Norway and Denmark in 1937, Austria in 1937, and Germany in 1938. He worked as a substitute teacher at Osby High School from 1933 to 1934 and as a subject teacher from 1934 to 1938. He worked as a teacher in Simrishamn from 1938 to 1939, Amål in 1940, and Ulricehamn from 1940 to 1944. At Ulricehamn Secondary School, he taught mathematics, physics, and chemistry starting from 1944.

educationCredential.name: Provisional Year at Gothenburg Primary School Seminary
